name: Cabin Clearer
description:
Backstory:

You've spent all winter in your cozy little cabin, but now it's all cluttered up with your old junk! One day you come home and decide that you've had enough. You will clean up your vacation home today!

Controls:

  • WASD or arrows to move
  • Escape to open the pause menu
  • Use the mouse for UI
Features:
  • A unique, dynamic soundtrack which progresses with the player throughout the experience!
  • 8 Sokoban-inspired puzzles, each providing a challenging experience for the player to exercise their mind!
  • A level select, where you can go back and try out your favourite levels again!
